name: Vac 'n Smash
description:
IMPORTANT: RECYCLE robot parts for the win!
Look for the conveniently placed green bins..

WASD: move, Space: jump, RMB sucks in junk, LMB fires junk back out.
Official Ludum Dare Entry Page

Junk robots have infested Ralph's scrapyard. It's time to call in the Hoover Man, a crack commando equipped with his trusty Vacuum Blaster. Smash those pesky robots and recycle their parts!
